weekly_top_story.headline: Climate Change Threatens 43% of Natural World Heritage Sites Globally
weekly_top_story.summary: A recent IUCN Outlook report reveals that nearly half of World Heritage sites face severe risks from climate change, invasive species, and wildlife diseases, posing a major threat to global biodiversity and cultural heritage.

stories.headline: Aid Operations in Gaza Expand Under New Ceasefire Deal, Boosting Daily Supply Limit to 600 Trucks
stories.summary: Humanitarian aid to Gaza is increasing dramatically following a fresh ceasefire agreement, with daily truck shipments set to more than double to help civilians after years of conflict.

stories.headline: Dozens Killed in Pakistan-Afghanistan Border Clashes Amid Disputed Cross-Border Attacks
stories.summary: Recent violent clashes between Taliban forces and Pakistani troops along their border have resulted in dozens of deaths and the closure of the border, escalating regional tensions.

stories.headline: Helicopter Crash at Huntington Beach, California Injures 5
stories.summary: A helicopter crash in Huntington Beach has resulted in five injuries, underscoring ongoing concerns about aviation safety in populated areas.
